kpi.name: M1008C297

kpi_info.title: MBLB IFHO ATTEMPTS WITH SERVICE AND UE FEATURE CAPA
kpi_info.use: The number of Multi-Band Load Balancing (MBLB) IFHO attempts with service and UE feature capability as highest weight. UPDATED: When the handover control starts inter-frequency handover attempt due to service and UE feature had highest weighting factor. If L3 rejects the handover attempt with cause "parallel procedures not allowed", the counter is not updated.

kpi.kpi_alias: MBLB IFHO ATTEMPTS WITH SERVICE AND UE FEATURE CAPA
